name: The 9th Circle
description:
You play Dana and you wake up in a weird carnival which is home to some strange creatures. Take your hammer and smash yourself through the levels and find out where you are and why you are here.

A short projekt made by students of Timebades Media in Mainz, Germany.

A game by Sina Hofmann

Main Character Animation by Raffaela Kupke

Sound by Joans Margraf
